{{cpp/experimental/ranges/tagged/title|swap}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/utility/tagged/navbar}}
{{ddcl|
constexpr void swap( tagged&amp; rhs ) noexcept(/* see below */)
    requires Swappable&lt;Base&gt;;
}}

Swap the contents of {{c|*this}} and {{c|rhs}}, as if by {{c|ranges::swap(static_cast&lt;Base&amp;&gt;(*this), static_cast&lt;Base&amp;&gt;(rhs));}}.

===Exceptions===
{{noexcept|noexcept(ranges::swap(std::declval&lt;Base&amp;&gt;(), std::declval&lt;Base&amp;&gt;()))}}
